name: Streamer Future Wars
description:
Streamer Future Wars is a high-fantasy hero collection RPG gacha game. Embark on your journey in this most questionable mobile-port gacha game. Only you can save the future of streaming.

  • Collect unique heroes from the streaming world
  • Level them, awaken and power them up
  • Gather items and equip them on your heroes
  • Breeze through story with handwritten dialogues
  • Climb in the arena to claim the number 1 spot

Battle through 40+ story chapters with unique story completely new made just for this game. Each stage contains a turn-based battle between your party of up to 5 heroes battling versus up to 5 enemies. Deplete their health bars to finish the stage. Any casualties on your side will cost you a star our of 3 possible stars for each stage. Special currency used in gacha can be acquired by clearing stage stars for the first time and daily/weekly missions.

Game contains specialized summons where you can acquire heroes. There is a hard pity of 30 summons for a classic legendary hero. There's also a special darklight summon that contains more powerful or unique heroes. This summon comes with a special currency and a hard pity of 50 summons. Every character in the game can be obtained by a f2p player after some saving up.

Not revolutionary by any means, and barely hitting the minimum standarts of a gacha hero game, but made with love and care!

Game contains possible events for seasonal times like winter holidays and halloween.

Gather completely unique streamer heroes, train and awaken them and upgrade their weapons. Also possibly with battlepass and pay to feed devs darklight battlepass. However you can collect all the heroes and beat everything in the game for completely free!

Free to play
*In-game purchases are available

*Please read the End-User License Agreement (EULA) from the in-game menu before playing

* Saves from mobile version are not compatible with the steam release
